optics.compression_rule: Telephoto compression for flattering facial proportions and cinematic depth

metadata.rendered_prompt: Hair: Minimal Chic, pin-straight, glass-smooth; consistent hair identity across shots. Framing: medium shot. Shot on a 135mm telephoto lens with natural optical bokeh; telephoto compression for flattering facial proportions and cinematic depth. Lighting: hard sunlight.

clauses.hair_structure: Hair: Minimal Chic, pin-straight, glass-smooth; consistent hair identity across shots.
